resources.string: Usando o processamento de linguagem natural de última geração, sugere receitas personalizadas com base em suas preferências, necessidades alimentares e ingredientes disponíveis.
A que equipamento de cozinha você tem acesso?
Com que frequência você cozinha refeições do zero?
O que você mais gosta no processo de cozinha?

1. In a deep frying pan or saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. 2. Add onion, celery, carrot and garlic. Fry the vegetables until soft, about 5-7 minutes. 3. Add the minced meat and cook it until brown, breaking it into small pieces. 4. Add tomato paste and canned tomatoes, mix. Cook for a few minutes to thicken the sauce. 5. Gradually add beef or vegetable broth to make the sauce more liquid. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 6. Reduce the heat to low, cover and cook the bolognese for about 1-2 hours, stirring occasionally. 7. Cook spaghetti or other pasta according to the instructions on the package. 8. Serve the bolognese with spaghetti or other pasta. Sprinkle parmesan on top, if desired.

1. Preheat the oven to 220 degrees Celsius. 2. Roll out the pizza ball on a baking sheet greased with olive oil. If you have already prepared the dough, unfold it on a baking sheet. 3. Apply tomato sauce evenly to the dough, leaving the edges free for crusts. 4. Grate the mozzarella on a coarse grater and spread it evenly over the sauce. 5. Cut the tomatoes into thin slices and put them on the pizza. 6. Sprinkle the pizza with basil, salt and pepper to taste. 7. Put the pizza in the preheated oven and cook for about 12-15 minutes, or until the crust turns golden and the cheese melts. 8. After cooking the pizza Margarita, let it cool down a little, then cut into pieces and serve.

1. Prepare the chicken breast: cut it into pieces and fry it in a frying pan with oil until golden brown. Let cool and cut into smaller pieces. 2. Prepare the salad: wash and dry the lettuce leaves, then tear them into several pieces. 3. Prepare the sauce: in a salad bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt and pepper passed through a press. Mix well. 4. Add the salad leaves to the salad bowl and mix thoroughly with the sauce. 5. Sprinkle the salad with grated parmesan and croutons. Stir again. 6. Garnish the caesar salad with chicken pieces on top. 7. Serve Caesar salad immediately.
Chefe de Romano ou Alface Iceberg
colheres de sopa de suco de limão
